pkgmetadata.longdescription: Calculate Multivariate Richness via UTC and sUTC // Functions to calculate Unique Trait Combinations (UTC) and scaled Unique Trait Combinations (sUTC) as measures of multivariate richness. The package can also calculate beta-diversity for trait richness and can partition this into nestedness-related and turnover components. The code will also calculate several measures of overlap. See Keyel and Wiegand (2016) doi:10.1111/2041-210X.12558 for more details.
